attributes.action: block bskyb's f1 deal and keep f1 fta
attributes.additional_details:
I want this goverment to put f1 listed event/sport protected event.to stop bskyb's monopoly I also want the competition commission to look at the deal
I would like the deal o be blocked  because under the new deaf bbc will only broadcast  3 f1races and sky will get every f1race live which I thihk will damage the sport and if the bbc does lose the rights after 2018 I am worried that bskyb's is testing the water to see if it pays dividends if it does then we will lose f1forever
On FTA
I call on the backbench committee to debate immediatly
